author: Associated Press
title: Singer P!nk Tests Positive for Coronavirus and Donates $1 Million to Relief Funds
description: The singer Pink had previously tested positive for COVID-19, she said Friday, also announcing that she is donating $500,000 each to two emergency funds.
content:
(LOS ANGELES) — The singer Pink had tested positive for COVID-19, she said Friday, also announcing that she is donating $500,000 each to two emergency funds.
In a pair of tweets, she said she and her three-year-old son were displaying symptoms two weeks ago,… [+1459 chars]
